header_text: About Pacing for Pain and Fatigue

elements.Text: Once the levels of joint pain became more manageable, she decided to clean her home since she was unable to during the last two days. It took XXXX a majority of the day to clean the entire home, which led to three more days of joint pain and inactivity. This can be a very common pattern that people living with chronic pain or fatigue deal with on a regular basis.
